attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: you are a total idiot.  You were a totally useless chancellor who stole millions from the pensioners and ordinary people of this country and just wasted it.  Then you stole our democracy.  Why is it that every time you are on tv you look like a rabbit caught in the healights?. You are and incompetant idiot and you ought to go now.  Why cant we e-mail number ten? not a hard one is it please just go away.  I am of to the scottish nationalist party to support independance so that this can never ever happen again
